abstracts.cdata!:
The Technical Assistance Project For
            Planning and Economic Management aims at reinforcing the
            capacity of the government for planning and economic
            management. This broad objective will be pursued by: (i)
            introducing improved procedures for programming, budgeting,
            and monitoring of public sector investments; (ii) helping to
            improve the preparation and analysis of investment projects;
            and (iii) organizing public finance into a more coherent
            structure. The project further aims to achieve the above
            objective by; (iv) strengthening Benin's institutions
            involved with the collection and analysis of statistics; and
            (v) providing training in project preparation and analysis,
            business accounting, and providing fellowships for advanced
            studies abroad in economics, public administration and
            business administration.
